name: 吉塔
objective:
COURSE OUTLINE: Clean Energy Technology is a basic course in English, mainly for the students who have not studied Environmental Sciences as a subject. The course will cover topics related to processes and techniques that reduce the negative environmental impacts like pollution and protect the planet. Students can gain introductory knowledge about clean and sustainable methods of producing clean energy and thereby preventing hazardous environmental issues through significant energy efficiency improvements and sustainable use of resources.
COURSE SYLLABUS
Week 1: Clean Energy Technology- Introduction
Week 2: Clean Energy Technology- Basics
Week 3: Clean Energy Sources
Week 4: Clean Energy Fuels
Week 5: Clean wastewater treatment 
Week 6: Biomass to Clean Energy conversion
Week 7: Environmental laws and regulations
Week 8: Sustainable Resource Management (SRM)
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Carbon Footprint 
Week 11: Carbon emissions trading
Week 12: Carbon biocapture
Week 13: Geoengineering
Week 14: Clean Agriculture
Week 15: Green Chemistry
Week 16: Sustainable Remediation
Week 17: Sustainable Tourism
Week 18: Final Exam
schedule:
1.　　The students will be separated into groups
2.　　In each class the Teacher will first teach a PowerPoint presentation
3.　　This will be followed by the presentations of the students in each group
4.　　The students can use Powerpoint and YouTube videos to make their presentations interesting
scorePolicy:
1.　　The Teacher will conduct 2 exams during the course (Midterm and Final) for 50 marks
2.　　The final score will be for 100% and it will be a sum of evaluations as 50% (from the final written exam) 25% (from the Midterm exam score) 15% (from the class presentations) 10% (from class attendance and attentiveness)
materials: This course does not have any prescribed book material as it involves many different disciplines. The Powerpoint presentations taught by the Teacher will be used by the students for exam preparation
